name: Robert Mill
description: I am a very cheerful man who can always support with a good joke and by giving a good piece of advice. It seems for me my main features are openness, tenderness, attentiveness and faithfulness. I must be honest, yes? Sometimes I may be naughty a little bit. I always look at the bright side of the road and I always believe in bright future. That is why I am here. I am absolutely sure that my second half really exists and I won’t hesitate to make first steps to find her
